body:
Comment 2 by **kyrieuon**: 
I know the method
 func (l *Logger) Output(calldepth int, s string) error

However, this is not the method
 func Output(calldepth int, s string) error
of this feature request.

Embedding a logger in the own implementation is not always an option, especially when
third party libraries come into play that might use the standard logging facility.  The
internal logger of the log package also cannot be shared with an own implementation. 
There's neither access to the logger itself nor to the mutex used for synchronization.

Please reopen this issue.
